examples: Close-up of glowing fireflies dancing in a dark forest at twilight. Soft bioluminescent particles float through the air. Shallow depth of field, bokeh lights in background. Magical atmosphere, gentle movement.
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation. Either prompt or multi_prompt must be provided, but not both.
prompt.title: Prompt

aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the generated video frame
aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio

duration.description: The duration of the generated video in seconds
duration.title: Duration

generate_audio.description: Whether to generate native audio for the video. Supports Chinese and English voice output. Other languages are automatically translated to English. For English speech, use lowercase letters; for acronyms or proper nouns, use uppercase.
generate_audio.title: Generate Audio

multi_prompt.description: List of prompts for multi-shot video generation. If provided, overrides the single prompt and divides the video into multiple shots with specified prompts and durations.
multi_prompt.title: Multi Prompt

voice_ids.description: Optional Voice IDs for video generation. Reference voices in your prompt with <<<voice_1>>> and <<<voice_2>>> (maximum 2 voices per task). Get voice IDs from the kling video create-voice endpoint: https://fal.ai/models/fal-ai/kling-video/create-voice
voice_ids.title: Voice Ids

shot_type.description: The type of multi-shot video generation
shot_type.title: Shot Type

cfg_scale.title: Cfg Scale
cfg_scale.description:
The CFG (Classifier Free Guidance) scale is a measure of how close you want
            the model to stick to your prompt.

duration.description: The duration of this shot in seconds
duration.title: Duration

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url
